title: Seeking pc advice!
body:
Hey all :)
Im currently looking to buy a laptop for school work and to play league of legends on and was wondering how well this laptop would run League of legends. Ideally id be after 60fps with above average graphics settings. Here it is....
SPECIFICATIONS
Brand/Model: Toshiba Satellite P50-C00X
Processor: 2.4GHz Intel core i7-5500U dual core processor
Memory: 16GB DDR3L (1600Mhz) RAM (Memory at maximum supportedl)
Disk Drive: 256GB M.2 SSD HDD
Optical Drive: DVD Writer
Display: 15.6" FHD Widescreen with LED Backlit Display (1920 x 1080)
Webcam: Built in HD Webcam with Mic
Connections/Ports: WLAN (INTEL 802.11ac/a/g/n) up to 867Mbps + Toshiba Bluetooth V4.0, HDMI supporting 4K2K output, 3 x USB 3.0 Ports + Sleep & Charge
Software: Windows 8.1 (64-bit)
Warranty: 12 Months
Graphics: 4GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950M Graphics
Sound: Harmon Kardon speakers

replies.body: If it is running a GTX 950M inside shouldn't be too hard to get 60fps, should be able to go higher.
